title: Custom Entity Models Model
description: CEM model files contain the definition of a whole entity model.

shadowSize.description: Shadow size as a scale, from 0.0 to 1.0.

models.description: Array of model objects that make up the entity's full model.

baseId.description: Model parent ID. If specified, all parent properties are inherited and do not need to be explicitly put.

model.description: Path to a JPM from which to load the part model definition. If this is not specified, the items in a JPM can be specified inline to this object, the parent of "model".

id.description: Model ID, can be used to reference the model as parent.

part.description: Entity part to which the part model is attached.

attach.description: How to handle replacing overlapping parts. If true, attach. If false, replace.
